title: Don't fire the guy who holds the patents. : r/ProRevenge - Reddit
body: Tikhon14 • 3 yr. ago. Application process requires a patent lawyer and the fees accumulate to 10,000 - 30,000$ per patent. It doesn't require a patent attorney. Plenty of people prosecute their own patents pro se, and it's a lot less than $10,000 per patent if you do it right.
